page.title: 16Housing in Voe.
page.content: Many new houses have been built in Voe over the past 10 years.This has mainly been due to the construction of the Sullom Voe Oil Terminal,which lies only 10 miles to the north of Voe. BP built a housing scheme for its employees,named Mulla, after the hill which they are built on.There are 25 detached houses in this scheme.The occupants of these houses change frequently as they are often transferred to work elsewhere for BP. Voe house was also bought by BP and houses the terminal manager's family at the moment.There are also three council owned housing schemes in Voe;Norderhoull,Norbrek and Isles Road,all of which are semi_detached. Voe is a very picturesque place in which to live and so has also attracted many to build privately.
